Um, one day, a rabbit and a dog was play in the... sandbox. They has shovels and they want to build a big sand_castle. They was having a lot of fun.

The dog was um carefully pat the sand to make the walls strong. The rabbit was digging with his bucket to get more sand. They work very hard on it. 

Umm, then the rabbit made a mistake. He lift his heavy bucket and dump all the sand right on top of the castle. It was an ac... accident, but the castle smash and fall down flat.

The dog was very up set. She start to cry because her hard work was ruin. The rabbit feel bad because he didn't mean to break it. He want to make things right. 

So, the rabbit start pat the sand back together. He try to fix the castle so the dog would be happy again. They decide to build a new one. The end.

Uh, suddenly... suddenly the rabbit... he make a... mistake. He lift his... his bucket. And dump all... all sand on... on top. Smash, smash, and... and fell down flat.

And the dog... she is... is very upset. She start cry. Cry cry. Her hard work... is... is ruin. And the rabbit... he feel bad. He don't mean to... to break it. He want to... to make things right.

And so, the rabbit... he start pat, pat pat. Fix the castle. So the dog... she will be happy again. They decide... decide to build new one. The end.

*Context:* Rabbit and dog play in sandbox.

*Adult Input:* "One day, a rabbit and a dog were playing in the sandbox. They had shovels and they wanted to build a big sandcastle together. They were having a lot of fun. The dog was carefully patting the sand to make the walls strong. The rabbit was digging with his bucket to get more sand. They worked very hard on it. Suddenly, the rabbit made a mistake. He lifted his heavy bucket and dumped all the sand right on top of the castle. It was an accident, but the castle smashed and fell down flat. The dog was very upset. She started to cry because her hard work was ruined. The rabbit felt bad because he didn't mean to break it. He wanted to make things right. So, the rabbit started patting the sand back together. He tried to fix the castle so the dog would be happy again. They decided to build a new one. The end."

Rabbit want to, make it right. So, rabbit pat pat sand. Try to fix. Fix castle. Dog happy again. They build new one. The end."
